content: this easy crochet tote bag pattern is a quick and easy pattern that may become your new go-to crochet bag pattern it makes a great crochet beach bag crochet market bag or a yarn carrying bag the pattern includes step-by-step instructions with diagrams and a full video tutorial about this pattern - learn how to crochet a bag with this easy follow crochet tote bag pattern with a photo and video tutorial - it uses only basic stitches single_crochet chain and slip stitches - this pattern uses two strands of yarn held together at the same time which creates a thick dense fabric making it the perfect material for your tote bag - you can use any size 4 medium worsted weight yarn - it works up really quickly
